Summary: Bright Star like Orb Slowly & silently passed above our home Updated:
divs: sighting detailsupdated! i'm posting again because i accidently posted the wrong date on the sighting. the sighting date was april 6, 2013. a very bright star like orb slowly passed (floated or glided) above our home tonight on april 6,2013 about 8:30 p.m.i went outside tonight to stargaze for the sole purpose of hoping to see this object & i was not disappointed.i was observing our clear night sky with all the stars in view & within 6 or 7 minutes of observing, is when i saw the bright star like orb in the distance to the south,heading north. i wear prescription eye glasses so with 20\20 vision, i could clearly see this object was not a airplane of any kind. i quickly ran inside to get my wife & it was moving so slow that it had not passed above our home yet by the time we both got back outside.me & my wife have both seen these orb's fly over before, so when she saw this,she knew immediately it was not a plane but of the same ufo's we've witnessed flying over our home before in the past. i had my binoculars so we took a couple of turns viewing the object when it was the closest to us & then finally when it was it's farthest away. when zoomed in with the binoculars, no outline of a craft was seen,just a shining bright white star like orb.it had no sound what so ever & was way lower than the airplanes we do see at night.i was not able to film as i need a new camera. these star like objects are truly breathe taking when viewing them. there is no way to make out what it is because the light it's emitting is so bright. it stayed on a straight path & slowly flew out of sight. so there was no sound & was probably moving around 20 mph. satellites & the iss are not visible like that. if someone at mufon would contact me,i could almost guarantee a sighting in my area i've got some film evidence from a similiar sighting like this one,but it's not great.hook me up with a great video camera & i guarantee we'll get some badd a footage.
